content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”flutter-sec”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”11112″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Flutter App Development Company” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%23292b7a” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]Flutter is a mobile app SDK for creating rich and fluid native interfaces for both iOS and Android-powered by Google. It offers best Cross-Platform App Development by keeping single codebase. Features like hot reload, widget libraries help to build beautiful native apps in record time.

At Angular Minds, being a prominent Flutter App Development Company, we passionately develop beautiful and functionally-rich mobile apps, crafted to meet your specific needs.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

 

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1606373056503{background-color: #292a7a !important;}”][vc_row el_class=”about-what-do-sec”][vc_column]

Flutter Benefits of Flutter Apps

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column el_class=”padding-right-sm”][vc_row_inner spacing=”default_no_spaces” gap=”25″ css=”.vc_custom_1505213882844{padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1505293346818{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;}”]

Single Codebase

A single Codebase runs it all. Flutter facilitates easy debugging and updating, all in one place. Flutter App builders can practically reuse 100 percent of the code for iOS and Android which in turn expedites the development process.

Access to Original Source Code

In iOS, source code has always been a mysterious black box. But with Flutter, you can easily understand why something behaves or looks a particular way. Customization has turned seemingly easy.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1505293592431{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;}”]

Fast Development

Flutter leads to dynamic mobile app development. Hot Reload facilitates Flutter developer-designer cooperation. Any improvements or experiments with the look and feel of an app can be done on the spot.

Iteration

Building Android and iOS mobile apps using Flutter have turned easy. Now, narrowing down on end designs after due experimentation and reviewing doesn’t take a considerable amount of time.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1505293094930{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;}”]

Flexible UI

The widgets on Flutter are rich, adaptable and it makes the UI flexible. The simple, adaptive layout system makes apps look good on every single screen. Upon iterating, the UI changes in front of your eyes in a fraction of a second.

Less testing

Flutter means less code, and less code implies fewer bugs. Due to one codebase, Flutter developers write automatic tests only once and the quality assurance process speeds up.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” enable_overlay=”enable_overlay_value” overlay_color=”rgba(0,183,241,0.89)” el_class=”flutter-sec-4tab”][vc_column]

Array Of Our Google Flutter Development

Launch your Business in Style

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Cross Platform App Development

We’ll help you to embrace your mobile strategy stronger by building high-quality cross-platform mobile apps for both iOS and Android Platform.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Get personalized services with us

Get Personalized assistance services which brings you closer to your customers needs with our customized flutter app development services.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

End-to-End Project Management

Hire flutter developers starting from the requirement gathering phase to the final delivery of the app, we handle everything to ensure quality project outcome.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Quick support & maintenance

Our team will help you with troubles of any complexity level by providing workarounds & Bug-fixes to a security audit and application enhancements.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”hire-dev-sec” css=”.vc_custom_1606656311447{background-color: #292a7a !important;}”][vc_column]
[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Hire Flutter Developer” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:40px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”vcr_heading-right”][vc_column_text]If you’re committed to building a robust application then hire a dedicated Flutter developer that creates efficient business processes with added business values.

Loaded with talented and devoted Flutter developers in Appitron Solutions, it is a quick procedure to acquire skillful expertise for your project. Inbuilt and customized widget sets in Flutter helps our Flutter developers to deliver all native features including scroll panel, navigation, templates, icon and fonts needed for an exciting application[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”11139″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” el_class=”flutter-app-sec”][vc_column el_align=”center” width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”11143″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column el_align=”center” width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”What Makes Us the Go-to Flutter App Development Company” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”vcr_heading-right”][vc_column_text]There are two things that set us apart in the Flutter ecosystem: The Brains and The Expertise.

We have a dedicated team of Dart engineers and Material Theming experts who know the nitty-gritties of Flutter app development inside out. There is no element in the framework left un-experimented by our team of designers and engineers.

We have been working on and around Flutter ever since it was first announced in 2018 by Google. Till date, we have completed 8+ successfully deployed projects that run on the capabilities of the framework. We also run several test-cases in-house to perfect the platform and prepare us for all the challenges we are yet to encounter.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column]
